titleStmt.title: A godly and learned answer, to a lewd and vnlearned pamphlet intituled, A few, plaine and forcible reasons for the Catholike faith, against the religion of the Protestants. By Richard Woodcoke Batchellor of Diuinitie.
titleStmt.author: Woodcoke, Richard.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by N. O[kes] for Iohn Bache and Nicholas Bourne, and are to be sold at his shop vnder the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: An answer to a popish pamphlet.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shop vnder the Royall Exchange
